trans-unit.source: Windows Universal Apps SDK Release Notes
trans-unit.target: Windows Universal Apps SDK Release Notes

trans-unit.source: Azure Mobile Engagement - Windows Universal Apps SDK Release Notes
trans-unit.target: Azure Mobile Engagement - Windows Universal Apps SDK Release Notes

trans-unit.source: Windows Universal Apps SDK Release Notes
trans-unit.target: Windows Universal Apps SDK Release Notes

trans-unit.source: The Mobile Engagement device id is now based on a GUID generated at installation time
trans-unit.target: The Mobile Engagement device id is now based on a GUID generated at installation time

trans-unit.source: Fixed a bug affecting the SDK initialization on some Windows Phone WinRT apps.
trans-unit.target: Fixed a bug affecting the SDK initialization on some Windows Phone WinRT apps.

trans-unit.source: Introducing the Mobile Engagement SDK for Universal App (Windows and Windows Phone WinRT).
trans-unit.target: Introducing the Mobile Engagement SDK for Universal App (Windows and Windows Phone WinRT).

trans-unit.source: Send back system notification action feedback when a notification is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Send back system notification action feedback when a notification is clicked.

trans-unit.source: Fixed system notification which is sometimes replayed in-app after being clicked.
trans-unit.target: Fixed system notification which is sometimes replayed in-app after being clicked.

trans-unit.source: Initial Release of Azure Mobile Engagement
trans-unit.target: Initial Release of Azure Mobile Engagement

trans-unit.source: appId/sdkKey configuration is replaced by a connection string configuration.
trans-unit.target: appId/sdkKey configuration is replaced by a connection string configuration.
